abstract: Marco Munoz, onetime home health aide to Jose Hernandez who has now become his legal guardian, receives financial aid from Kennedy Child Study Center to help meet Jose's extensive needs; center is affiliate of Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: When Marco Muñoz began taking care of Jose Hernandez, a boy with severe autism and developmental disabilities, they developed a special bond.

headline.main: Home Health Aide Becomes a Guardian and, He Hopes, a Father
headline.print_headline: Aide Becomes a Guardian and, He Hopes, a Father

snippet: When Marco Muñoz began taking care of Jose Hernandez, a boy with severe autism and developmental disabilities, they developed a special bond.
